```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

dat <- readxl::read_xlsx("genai_activity_guidance_table.xlsx", sheet = 1) %>%
  filter(Activity == "Abstract and Summary Writing") %>%
  select(Activity, 
         Gold = `Gold standard for professional practice`,
         Good = `How GenAI can be helpful (good practice)`,
         Poor = `How GenAI can pose risks (poor practice)`,
         Skills = `Main Skills Category`, 
         Assessment = `Assessment type`,
         Example = `Example assessments`)


```

# Abstract and Summary Writing

**Gold standard for Professional Practice:** `r dat %>% select(Gold) %>% pull()`

**How GenAI can be helpful (good practice):** `r dat %>% select(Good) %>% pull()`

**How GenAI can pose risks (poor practice):** `r dat %>% select(Poor) %>% pull()`

**Main Skills Category:** `r dat %>% select(Skills) %>% pull()`

**Assessment Type:** `r dat %>% select(Assessment) %>% pull()`

**Example Assessments:** `r dat %>% select(Example) %>% pull()`
